desc.p: It should be a valid T24 filename i.e Present on FILE.CONTROL.Optional Input.
Type=Alphanumeric; Length=35Name of Source Table associated to this event type. Validation rules:
Clients can set up records in EB.ACTIVITY and define individual message types in EB.ADVICES application to send alerts - taking up soft-delivery route
Type=Alphanumeric; Length=35 One of the Identified event Types
